comments.comment: Ane videoeka baluwe andana gaman.Deyyane a ammata ehema karanna  oya manussayata puluwan weema ganai puduma.oya thathweta gaththe anma kiyana eka kohomada ookunta amathaka wenne.Anika gaanu daahak hoya gaththa haki.Eth amma kenek hoya ganna baa.buuruwoo eka thearum ganin.Aasawata neme buddiyata thana denna puruduweyan.Ara akka kiwwa wage marunama koaatiyak viyadam kalath rattu kelagahanawa apahaasa karanawa.nopeneddi ammata wandata wedak naa.jeewath weddi wandala samawaaran a ammagen aasirwaada ganna.oya salli kiyanaewa gindara wage amma aasirwaada nokaloth vinaasawela yai.Uthum sathgunawath daruwek weyan nudutu malliye.Eka wachanen kiyanna bari kusalayak wei.
comments.author: Uae Ae
